channel.title: [pi] Item on object
channel.description:
Ok so i asked this before but got kinda confused. how would i make it so when use an item on the object it will give you another object
Example: Gold charm on Oblisk It will take away the wolf bones and 1 charm and give you spirt wolf pouch?
